remarks: Group subtraction (division) operation.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)
statement:
grpsubval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubval.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpsubval.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpsubfval $p |- .- = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x .+ ( I ` y ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d I x y $.
